name: Get A Load of This!
description:
GET A LOAD OF THIS!

A one screen, one level puzzle game for the Confounding Calendar about saving the world. And loading it.

CONTROLS:

  • left right or AD to move left and right
  • up or W to jump
  • down or S on a green block to do something
  • R to reset to the last checkpoint (blue)

The following is a hidden description of how the mechanics work. I would recommend looking at it, but I am hiding it just in case you want to try figuring everything out yourself.

How does it work?

Press down on an empty green block to save the position and state of every entity in the world onto the block. Press down again on a green block to load its saved state. Anything sitting on the green block (and the green block itself) is not reloaded.

Pressing R to go back to the last blue checkpoint is not needed to solve the puzzle.
